definition: last year/the Chinese New Year (i.e. the new year in the old calendar)

sentences.english: The last day of the old year I and my parents get together to have a party.
sentences.chinese: 舊年的最後一天，我和我的父母走到一起，有黨。

sentences.english: The aim here is to rid your home of any bad luck that's accumulated over the past year.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做的目的是去除家裏舊年累積的任何黴運。

sentences.english: All best wishes for happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 舊年高亡，並致以美好的祝願。

sentences.english: They sang the old year out and the new year in.
sentences.chinese: 他們唱歌送走舊年，迎接新年。

sentences.english: We can persist in the good principles in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 新年能堅持舊年自己所守的戒律。

sentences.english: Said goodbye to the last, we crossed into the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 告別了舊年，我們跨入了新的一年。

sentences.english: We can be grateful to the graces that people did it to us in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 我們新年能感恩舊年一切人所賜的恩德。
